data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Huesca, Aragón, Spain that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Huesca, Aragón, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Huesca, Aragón, Spain will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Huesca, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Huesca.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Monzón
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Monzón, Aragón, Spain.
Lord, help the people of Huesca, Aragón, Spain to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Huesca with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the county of Huesca, Aragón, Spain has a population of 228,400.

We estimate Huesca has 3,657 people who might know Jesus, 172,918 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 51,825 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Huesca, Aragón, Spain.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.
